name: vue-typescript
description: Typescript decorators to make vue play nice with typescript

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf coverage && rm -rf built && rm -rf lib
scripts.cover: tsc && istanbul cover  node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha built/test/**/*.js && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/html-report -t html

author: Francis O'Brien
